metadata.title: CVE-2013-4408

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for Raspberry Pi 12 SP2

metadata.description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the dcerpc_read_ncacn_packet_done function in librpc/rpc/dcerpc_util.c in winbindd in Samba 3.x before 3.6.22, 4.0.x before 4.0.13, and 4.1.x before 4.1.3 allows remote AD domain controllers to execute arbitrary code via an invalid fragment length in a DCE-RPC packet.

criterions.comment: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP4 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP5 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP1 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP2 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for Raspberry Pi 12 SP2 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP3 is installed
